steps.name: Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Wait for the page listing to be loaded
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']
Click on the row 1 in the data table
Get attribute id of element By.xpath: //tbody//tr[1]
Wait for the page to be loaded
Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox
Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Click on the element By.xpath: //*[@id='crisp-chatbox']//a[@aria-label='Open chat']
